name: Zeroed Out
description:
Controls

Use WASD to move and E/Left Click to interact with objects

Lore

2195 - The Earth is destroyed. The surviving humans took off aboard the spaceships of the Xerxes corporation. 

2221 - A new planet is found and a reconnaissance team is sent. However a mysterious tragedy strikes the reconnaissance ship.

2222- You play as Sandman, a member of the rescue crew who goes to investigate the causes of the tragedy.
